response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance efficiency and productivity in your specific field. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $18,000. This exclusive offer includes a comprehensive warranty, dedicated customer support, and access to our latest updates and improvements. I trust that you will find this investment valuable for your business or personal needs. If you're interested in learning more about the product or discussing the details further, please let me know at your earliest convenience. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 18000}
